titleStmt.title: SII 7.782: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 782. (A.R. No. 157 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tribhuvanacakravat=tikaḷ śrīkulot=tuṅkacoḻatevaṟku yāṇṭu muṉṟāvatu rājarājavaḷaṉāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭu Utavi tirumāṇikuḻi yāḷuṭaiyāṟku tiruppaṭimāṟṟuk=kum tiruviḷak=kuk=kum tiruppaṇikaḷuk=kum mokan
Āḻkkoḷḷiāna kulot=tuṅkacoḻa k=kāṭavarāyanen Ittevar tirunāmattukāṇi Uḷḷūr tirupperampalam ponmeyn=taperumāḷnallūr vaṭapāṟkellai tirukkeṭilat=tu niroṭukāluk=ku teṟkum kiḻpāṟkellai tiruvayin=tirapurat=tāḻ
vār tevatānam pirekameṉṟu perkūvappaṭṭu t=tiruvariyiliṭṭa nilat=tuk=ku meṟkum tenpāṟkellai yañcāṅ kaṇṇāṟeṉṟu perkūvappaṭṭa kaṇṇāṟṟuk=ku vaṭak=kum melpāṟkellai mānakān=taṉeṉṟu perkūvappaṭṭa
voṭaiyil melācaṟitik=ku k=kiḻak=kum yinnāṉkellai Uṭpaṭṭa nilat=til nirnilamuṅ kollaiyum nat=tamum tirunan=tanavanaṅkaḷum kamuku tirunan=tanavanaṅkaḷum ponmeyn=taperumāṇallū rellai Uṭpaṭṭa nilam Irupat=tunālumāvum kulo
t=tuṅkacoḻanallū rellai Uṭpaṭṭa nilam nāṟpatumāvum Ālappāk=kat=til piṟin=ta Etirilicoḻanallūr nilam Aṟupat=tu Iraṇṭumā muk=kāṇiyum In=nattanilam Irupattu nālumāvum coḻakulavallinallūrt tenpiṭākai villiyanallūr
ril vik=kiramacoḻanallūreṉṟu piṟin=ta Ūrkk=ki ḻiṟaiyili nilam nāṟpatumāvum Ivvūril Eytanūrkkaṭṭaḷaiyil Iraṇṭāyiravar tirunun=tāviḷak=kuppuṟam muṉṟumāvum paṭṭānpāk=ka ttuk=kaṭṭaḷaiyil nilam muṉṟumāvum tiripuvanamāteviccaturvetimaṅkala
t=tut tenpiṭākai cempiyanmātevivaḷanāṭṭil peruñcānpāk=kat=tu nat=tat=tuk=ku k=kiḻak=ku Āmaipaḷḷameṉṟu perkūvappaṭṭa nilat=tu nilam Ampatumāvum Ivvūrkaḷil perumpāṭikāvalāl Iṭak=kaṭaviyina vellām Ittevaṟku tiruppaṭi
māṟṟuk=ku n=tiruviḷak=kuk=kum tiruppaṇikaḷuk=kum maṟṟum veṇṭum niman=taṅkaḷukkum perumpāṭikāval tavirt=tu Ittevark=ku k=kalveṭṭik=kuṭutten mokan Āḻkkoḷḷiyāna kulot=tuṅkacoḻa k=kāṭavarāyanen Ittanmam Aḻippār tiruvāṇai
tiripuvanamuḻutuṭaiyā rāṇai tiruviraiyāk=kali naṭuvukottuvil piṭicār Ittanma maḻippān vallavaraiyan cat=tiyam vātāvikaḷukku piḻaittārāvār Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.782 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
